readability-use-concise-preprocessor-dir.description:
Description

Finds uses of
#if
that can be simplified to
#ifdef
or
#ifndef
and,
since C23 and C++23, uses of
#elif
that can be simplified to
#elifdef
or
#elifndef
:

#if defined(MEOW)
#if !defined(MEOW)
// becomes
#ifdef MEOW
#ifndef MEOW

Since C23 and C++23:

#elif defined(MEOW)
#elif !defined(MEOW)
// becomes
#elifdef MEOW
#elifndef MEOW
readability-use-concise-preprocessor-dir.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
